description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

2 Canonbury Park South, Islington, London, N1 2JJ.

TPO Reference:

T26 & T27 – Purple leaf plums of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007.
T28 & T29 – Cherries of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007.
T30 & T31 – Norway maples of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007.

PO Number:

T090137

Work specifications:

2 x Purple leaf plums (T26&T27) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007
Crown thin by a maximum of 20% and remove epicormic growth.

2 x Cherry trees (T28&T29) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007
Crown thin by a maximum of 20% and remove epicormic growth.

1 x Norway Maple (T30) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007
Fell to ground level and remove stump.

1 x Norway Maple (T31) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007
Remove epicomic growth.
decision_conditions: The aurthority requires that a standard Field Maple ( Acer campestre)  be planted in the location of the tree to be removed (T 30 of LBI TPO (No.342) 2007. The tree to be planted within the first  planting season following the removal.
